  • Constructor Details

    • HerbalistEffect

      public HerbalistEffect()
      Class constructor. It creates an instance of the class containing a maximum number of possible bans for the islands.

    • HerbalistEffect

      public HerbalistEffect(int statusAvailableBans)
      Class constructor used to restore the game.
      Parameters:
      statusAvailableBans - Indicates the bans that are still available, saved into the status. These are going to be stored into the availableBans attribute.

    • effect

      public void effect(HerbalistEffect.Action action) throws NoMoreBansLeftException
      Decides to call the takeBan() method or the restoreBan() method, through a conditional branch on command parameter.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be performed.
      Throws:
      NoMoreBansLeftException - if there are no more available bans.
